jrtr.gldeferredrenderer

Class DirectionalDiffuseSecondPassDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.gldeferredrenderer.DirectionalDiffuseSecondPassDrawer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SecondPassDrawer

    public class DirectionalDiffuseSecondPassDrawer
extends java.lang.Object
implements SecondPassDrawer
    Sets up a shader and textures for deferred shading. A default implementation that uses a default shader that simply passes through a texture from the framebuffer.
    Author:
    Heinrich Reich

        public void managePerspective(com.jogamp.opengl.GL3 gl,
                              Camera cam,
                              Frustum frust)
        Description copied from interface: SecondPassDrawer
        Manages the perspective of the view. You actually want to cache the camera and frustum coordinates, since they are overriden by the context when the second image gets rendered.
        Specified by:
